qas.question: What country borders Eritrea in the west?
What country borders Eritrea in the south?
What country borders Eritrea in the southeast?
What extensive coastline makes up a portion of Eritrea's East border?
What is the total area of the nation of Eritrea?
What is the total area of Ethiopia?
What is the total area of Djibouti?
What is the name of one of the Hanish Islands?
In what year was Eritrea founded?
What is the total area of the Red Sea?

context: Eritrea (/ˌɛrᵻˈtreɪ.ə/ or /ˌɛrᵻˈtriːə/;, officially the State of Eritrea, is a country in East Africa. With its capital at Asmara, it is bordered by <a0_0>Sudan<a0_0/> in the west, <a1_0>Ethiopia<a1_0/> in the south, and <a2_0><b7_0>Djibouti<b7_0/><a2_0/> in the southeast. The northeastern and eastern parts of Eritrea have an extensive coastline along the <a3_0>Red Sea<a3_0/>. The nation has a total area of approximately <a4_0><b5_0><b9_0>117,600 km2<b9_0/><b5_0/> (<b6_0>45,406 sq mi<b6_0/>)<a4_0/>, and includes the Dahlak Archipelago and several of the Hanish Islands. Its name Eritrea is based on the Greek name for the Red Sea (Ἐρυθρὰ Θάλασσα Erythra Thalassa), which was first adopted for Italian Eritrea in <b8_0>1890<b8_0/>.
